Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I became better at sight singing, interval recognition, dictation, and other basic musicianship skills.

The work in the main class (excluding keyboard lab) was very reasonable and manageable, as I felt like it was a lot of guided practice time.  However, the keyboard lab definitely made it harder to focus on the main course because of the sheer time commitment.  I was not aware how much time the keyboard lab would consume when selecting this course.

This course isn't tons of work, yet absolutely more than half the work of a one-credit class. The workload compared to some one-credit courses I've taken with modest workloads. The department should consider designating this course as a full credit.
I would recommend this course on the basis that they understand that keyboard lab takes many extra hours of practice, and to plan this course as if it were a one or even one and a half credit course.
